sentences: K천rge temperatuuri t천ttu lasevad metallid paremini elektrit.
context: The word 'lasevad' is the 3rd person plural present form of the Estonian verb 'lasma', which means 'to let, allow, permit'. In some contexts, it can also mean 'to emit, release or discharge' something. It's used when talking about what multiple people/things are currently letting, allowing, permitting, emitting, releasing or discharging.
